entry.dcterms:description: origin, education level, professional and political career of candidates for Parliament
entry.dcterms:subject: social conditions and indicators
political institutions, public administration
elections
person
survey data
cross-section
No sampling; all MP candidates with mathematically calculated chances of being elected by the electoral law. 45% of target persons returned the posted questionnaire.
Posted self-administered questionnaires.
A
